mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAYDETAIL( orderNum, oNum, cartCnt) SELECT #{orderNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, onum, cartcnt from cart where regId = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT sum(afterPrice) as amount from( SELECT
(p.BPRICE * (1 - p.discount) + o.oprice) * c.cartcnt + p.dprice as afterPrice, c.REGID as regId FROM CART c JOIN OPT o ON c.oNum = o.oNum JOIN IMAGE i ON o.pNum = i.refNum JOIN PRODUCT p ON o.pnum = p.pnum
GROUP BY (p.BPRICE * (1 - p.discount) + o.oprice) * c.cartcnt + p.dprice, c.REGID)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAY ( orderNum, amount, dName, dPostNum, dAddr, dDetAddr, dPhone, dMemo, payMethod, payId, payDt ) VALUES ( #{orderNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dPostNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dAddr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dDetAddr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dPhone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dMemo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payMethod, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CART WHERE regId = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
